mapper.select: select c.p_name , a.ta_no , a.ta_name , to_char(a.ta_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as starttime , to_char(a.ta_date +30/(24*60) , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as endtime from co_task a, co_med b, patient c where a.co_no = b.co_no and b.p_no = c.p_no and a.co_no = #{coNo} and to_char(a.ta_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.ta_status = 1 and a.d_id = #{dId}
SELECT a.ta_no ,a.ta_name ,TO_CHAR(a.ta_date,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm') AS ta_date ,b.d_id ,b.d_name FROM co_task a ,doctor b WHERE a.d_id = b.d_id and a.reserv_yn='Y'

SELECT DISTINCT ( a.ta_no ) AS ta_no ,a.co_no ,a.d_id ,b.d_name ,e.p_name ,substr(e.p_rnum,0,8) AS p_rnum ,e.p_sex ,TO_CHAR(a.ta_date,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss') AS ta_date ,a.ta_name FROM co_task a ,doctor b ,co_doctor c ,co_med d ,patient e WHERE a.d_id = b.d_id AND b.d_id = c.d_id AND d.p_no = e.p_no AND a.co_no = d.co_no AND a.reserv_yn='Y' AND a.d_id = #{d_id} ORDER BY ta_date

select distinct(a.rsv_no) as rsv_no, to_char(a.rsv_day,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm')as rsv_day, a.rsv_day, a.rsv_name, a.p_no, a.d_id, b.d_name, substr(c.p_rnum,0,8) as p_rnum, c.p_sex from reservation A, doctor B, patient C where a.p_no=c.p_no and a.d_id= b.d_id and to_char(a.rsv_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.d_id=#{d_id} order by a.rsv_day

select distinct (a.ta_no) as ta_no, a.co_no, a.d_id, b.d_name, e.p_name, substr(e.p_rnum,0,8) as p_rnum, e.p_sex, to_char(a.ta_date,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm')as rsvDay, a.ta_name from co_task A, doctor B, co_doctor C, co_med D, patient E where a.d_id=b.d_id and b.d_id=c.d_id and d.p_no = e.p_no and a.co_no = d.co_no and to_char(a.ta_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.d_id=#{d_id} order by ta_date
UPDATE co_task SET reserv_yn = 'N' WHERE ta_no = #{ta_no}
select b.co_no, b.co_disease, c.p_name, b.co_doc from co_doctor a, co_med b, patient c where b.p_no = c.p_no and a.co_no = b.co_no and a.d_id = #{dId}

select c.p_name , a.ta_no , d.d_name , a.ta_name , a.ta_content , to_char(a.ta_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as starttime , to_char(a.ta_date +30/(24*60) , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as endtime , e.ma_name from co_task a, co_med b, patient c,doctor d,major e where a.co_no = b.co_no and b.p_no = c.p_no and a.d_id = d.d_id and d.ma_no = e.ma_no and a.co_no = #{coNo} and d.d_id = #{dId} and to_char(a.ta_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.ta_status = 1 order by a.ta_date
